main products of photocatalysis were CH 4 , CH 3 OH and HCHO.The deposited Pt acted as an effective cocatalyst, which not only influenced the selectivity of the product generation, but also affected the activity of the reaction.The yield of CH 4 first increased upon increasing the amount of Pt deposited on the g-C 3 N 4 from 0 to 1 wt, then decreased at 2 wt Pt loading.The production rates of CH 3 OH and HCHO also increased with the content of Pt increasing from 0 to 0.75 wt and the maximum yield was
